content: 3 with b sl bor m and m1 brk yfslyo to m2 sl replace m2 brp yfslyo to eor m2 brp yfslyo to eor set-up round 4 with a sl bor m and m1 yfslyo brp to m2 repeat rnds 1-4 until m2 is next to bor m then repeat rnds 1 and sl m2 yfslyo brk to eor 2 once more bind off as follows with a brp *k1 bind off 1 set-up round 5 with b sl bor m remove m1 brp yfslyo st brp bind off 1 st repeat from * to 1 st before m1 k1 bind off replace m1 brk yfslyo to m2 remove m2 brk yfslyo 1 st remove m1 *k1 bind off 1 st brp bind off 1 st repeat from replace m2 brp yfslyo to eor * to eor cut both yarns and fasten_off weave in ends block lightly if desired all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/19/23 © fairmount fibers ltd 2023 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
